faq_item.name: What Crypto Accounts can I add to the wallet?
faq_item.content: Currently, the wallet accepts Bitcoin, Litecoin, DigiByte, Dogecoin, Dash, Ethereum, Tron, Klever, and all tokens from the Tron and Ethereum blockchains.

faq_item.name: Can new Coins be added?
faq_item.content: Of course! Our team will add new coins constantly. You can suggest the inclusion of a new currency by our support.

faq_item.name: Which Tron and ETH tokens are available in the wallet?
faq_item.content: TYou can access any token by searching the app's tokens. But we only selected the main ones for pre-listing.

faq_item.name: What is a Klever stable coin?
faq_item.content: A stable coin is a cryptocurrency that is priced based on another currency. The advantage of using Klever's stable coins is that they run on Tron's blockchain, a faster blockchain and with lower fees than the original coins (kBTC is a stable coin paired with BTC and kETH is a stable coin paired with ETH).

faq_item.name: How to add a token that is not appearing in the wallet?
faq_item.content:
You just need to follow the steps:

  • 1. Click on the filter button next to the search input on the portfolio screen.
  • 2. Search for the desired Token
  • 3. Activate it to be incorporated into your portfolio. It's just this.
